text: Yuri Cornelisse (born 8 May 1975 in Alkmaar) is a Dutch retired footballer who played as a striker.Yuri Cornelisse deed een beroepskeuzetest en werkt nu bij de zedenpolitie vice.com ==Club career== His former teams are FC Groningen,Yuri Cornelisse drie jaar naar Groningen - Voetbal International TOP Oss, Anderlecht, RKC and NAC.Yuri Cornelisse verruilt RKC voor NAC Breda - Voetbal International He finished his career at ADO Den Haag in 2010. Yuri Cornelisse ruilt voetballoopbaan in voor politie - Parool ==Personal life== He is the elder brother of Tim Cornelisse. He retired from football to become a police officer.Agent Yuri Cornelisse zwaait af als international in ‘zijn’ Waalwijk - Omroep Brabant ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Alkmaar Category:Association football forwards Category:Dutch footballers Category:TOP Oss players Category:R.S.C. title: Yuri Cornelisse
